titles.title: MORE TOD Act
Maximizing Our Redevelopment and Efficiency for Transit Oriented Development Act
Maximizing Our Redevelopment and Efficiency for Transit Oriented Development Act
MORE TOD Act
MORE TOD Act
To amend MAP-21 to provide that certain station projects are eligible for funds under the program for transit-oriented development planning, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
Maximizing Our Redevelopment and Efficiency for Transit Oriented Development Act or the MORE TOD Act
This bill provides that existing transit stations servicing a fixed guideway capital system project are eligible for funding under the pilot program for transit-oriented development planning.
